docs.title: 不将就，是对自己热爱的负责 🌟
docs.text:
标签: 量子信息, 机器学习, 英语学习

地区: 辣椒省

专业: 计算机科学与技术

邮箱: yuukikonno1314@gmail.com

欢迎来到我的博客！我是量子信息、量子物理学和计算机科学的爱好者。虽然目前本硕都是计算机科学与技术，但是实际上我的研究方向是量子信息。我是量子信息的初学者，如果我的博客内容中有任何错误或者模糊的地方，请及时联系我。从我的头像和昵称，你可以看出我其实也是《刀剑神域》中优纪（绀野木棉季）的忠实粉丝，她告诉了我生命的意义以及对待自己热爱的态度。我希望她心碎但又十分充满意义的旅程也能引起您的关注！

docs.title: Goal of My Blog 🚩
docs.text: 该博客是对我所获得的知识的个人反思，也是记录我的学习旅程的一种方式。如果您能在这里找到对自己有用的信息，或者得到不一样的灵感，我将不胜感激。

docs.title: Contact me 📫
docs.text: 如果您有有趣的事情想与我分享，请随时通过我的电子邮件告诉我

docs.title: Keep Young and Keep Curious 🌟
docs.text:
Tag: Quantum Information, Machine Learning, English Learning

Insitution: IFFS UESTC

Major: CS

Email: yuukikonno1314@gmail.com

Welcome to my blog! I’m passionate about quantum information, quantum physics, and computer science. My academic journey has been rooted in "Computer Science and Technology," with a focus on quantum information technology in my postgraduate studies. As a beginner in this exciting field, I appreciate any feedback on my posts. You’ll also find that I’m a huge fan of Yuuki Konno from "Sword Art Online," whose story beautifully captures the value of life and the essence of hope. I hope her heartfelt journey resonates with you as much as it has with me!

docs.title: Goal of My Blog 🚩
docs.text: This blog serves as a personal reflection on the knowledge I've gained and a way to document my learning journey. I hope you find useful information and inspiration here that enhances your own understanding. Thank you for joining me on this exploration!

docs.title: Contact me 📫
docs.text: If you have something interesting want to share with me, feel easy to let me know through my email.
